mapper.select: SELECT em.account_name AS accountName, a.sid AS accountSid, a.avarta AS avarta, sum(s.step_num) AS stepNum FROM t_event_members em LEFT JOIN account a ON em.account_sid = a.sid LEFT JOIN steps s ON a.sid = s.account_sid WHERE em.event_id = #{param1} AND s.device_sid IS NOT NULL GROUP BY a.sid ORDER BY stepNum DESC
